name: hartford
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of the US state of Connecticut: The temple serves people of Sikh faith from the Hartford area. Fire trucks from Hartford carried a crew of emergency workers headed to a New Jersey staging area.
More examplesFewer examplesShe grew up in Hartford.He spent five years working as a nurse in Hartford.The team will travel to Navy on February 15 and Hartford on April 27.Dionne Warwick grew up in a family of gospel singers and attended college in Hartford, Connecticut.From downtown Hartford to suburban business centers, production at many Connecticut companies slowed dramatically.
